#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
char a [101];
int num,flg=0;

void printt(int number, int label , int index)
{
  
  if(flg==1)
  	return;
  if(number==0)
  {
    printt(3,1,0);
    printt(4,2,0);
    return;
  }

  if(label>num)
  {
    return;
  }
  if(label==num)
    {
      a[index]=number+'0';
      flg=1;
      return;
      
    }
  else if (label<num)
   {
   	  a[index]=number+'0';

	  printt(3,(2*label+1),index+1);
      printt(4,(2*label+2),index+1);
      return;

   }
   return;

}
int main()
{
  cin>>num;
  printt(0,0,0);
  cout<<a;


}
